abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Normal Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Normal Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys Normal Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each of your opponent's Pokémon. If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.effect: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to Froslass. During your opponent's next turn, if Froslass would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Icy Breath
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shadow Force
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Giratina during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Brutal Edge
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Poison
attacks.effect: Choose either Burned or Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition. You may return Gliscor and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Magma Storm
attacks.effect: You may discard as many basic Energy cards as you like attached to Heatran. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Aqua Stream
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for as many Water Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and this attack does 10 damage for each Water Energy card you chose. Put those cards on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dragon Pump
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.effect: If your opponent has any Pokémon LV.X in play, each of Luxray's attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Luxray.

attacks.name: Shock Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Luxray.

attacks.name: Ice Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Charge Through
attacks.effect: You may do 60 damage plus 40 more damage and 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If you do, Mamoswine does 40 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Magnetic Reversal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extra Comet Punch
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Metagross's Extra Comet Punch attack's base damage is 100.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Enthusiasm
abilities.effect: If you have Poliwag, Poliwhirl, and Poliwrath in play, each of these Pokémon's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Steel Coating
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Probopass by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 for each Metal Energy attached to Probopass (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Metal Bomber
attacks.effect: Choose a number of your opponent's Benched Pokémon up to the amount of Metal Energy attached to Probopass. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Speed Gain
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic Fire Energy card or a basic Lightning Energy card and attach it to Rayquaza. This power can't be used if Rayquaza is affected by a Special Condition or if you have another Rayquaza in play.

attacks.name: Sky Judgment
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.effect: Regigigas can't attack until your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left.

attacks.name: Crush Grip
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 120.

abilities.name: Curse Breath
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Spiritomb from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on all Pokémon that already have any damage counters on them (both yours and your opponent's). You can't use more than 1 Curse Breath Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Transfer Pain
attacks.effect: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sonic Wave
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pursue and Turn
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and switch Yanmega with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fossil Armor
abilities.effect: If Armaldo would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Armaldo if that damage is 60 or less.

attacks.name: Crush Claw
attacks.effect: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Azelf from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at all of your face-down Prize cards. If you do, you may choose 1 Pokémon you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then, choose 1 card in your hand and put it as a Prize card face down.

attacks.name: Lock Up
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Parallel Gain
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blend Pollen
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Vileplume and each Bellossom you have in play. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Drain Down
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 30 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. If the Defending Pokémon would be Knocked Out by this attack, you may remove all damage counters from Cradily.

attacks.name: Acid
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Gripthrow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.

attacks.name: Prop-up Pinchers
attacks.effect: If Crawdaunt has a Technical Machine card attached to it, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Attracting Body
abilities.effect: If Delcatty is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Delcatty is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Attack Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Attack Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys Attack Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Psychic Boost
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Deoxys's Psychic Boost attack's base damage is 20.

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Defense Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Defense Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys Defense Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Psychic Defense
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of an attack, and any damage done to Deoxys by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Speed Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Speed Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys Speed Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Speed Shot
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ditto DNA
abilities.effect: As long as Ditto is your Active Pokémon, its maximum HP is the same as your opponent's Active Pokémon. Ditto can use the attacks of that Pokémon as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.) If that Pokémon is no longer your opponent's Active Pokémon, choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon for Ditto to copy.

abilities.name: Iron Shell
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to Forretress (excluding effects of attacks), you may flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding any Forretress).

attacks.name: Explosion
attacks.effect: Forretress does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Drought
attacks.effect: Choose up to 2 basic Fighting Energy cards from your hand and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Major Earthquake
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fighting Energy attached to Groudon and this attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Smelt
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Heatran. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: One Desire
attacks.effect: Search your deck for any 1 card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Doom Desire
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Jirachi. The Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out at the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Drizzle
attacks.effect: Choose up to 2 basic Water Energy cards from your hand and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: High Tide
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Water Energy attached to Kyogre. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Healing Tail
abilities.effect: As long as Lopunny is your Active Pokémon, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Benched Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.effect: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Psychic Bind
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Mesprit from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Your opponent can't use any Poké-Powers on his or her Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Focus Punch
attacks.effect: If Poliwrath was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Submission
attacks.effect: Poliwrath does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Regi Move
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Discard 2 cards from your hand and choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon. Then, your opponent switches that Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Regice is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ice Reflect
attacks.effect: If Regice was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Recover Mechanism
abilities.effect: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Regigigas, remove all Special Conditions from Regigigas.

attacks.name: Gigaton Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Regi Cycle
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Fighting Energy card in your discard pile, you may discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, attach a Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to Regirock. This power can't be used if Regirock is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Regi Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, remove 3 damage counters from Registeel. This power can't be used if Registeel is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Rotating Claws
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Registeel. If you do, search your discard pile for an Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to Registeel.

abilities.name: Resent
abilities.effect: Once during your opponent's turn, if Shedinja would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon and each of your opponent's Pokémon that has the same name as the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Curse and Deceive
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. If Shedinja has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.effect: As long as Torkoal is your Active Pokémon, prevent all effects, including damage, done to your Benched Pokémon by your opponent's attacks.

attacks.name: Black Soot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Paralyzed.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Unown ! from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If tails, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Unown ! does 10 damage to itself, and this attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

abilities.name: Set Up
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Uxie from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic Restore
attacks.effect: You may put Uxie and all cards attached to it on the bottom of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Burning Scent
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned. Before applying these effects, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. The new Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Energy Dissolve
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon at the end of your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Energy Reaction
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Grass or Psychic Energy card from your hand to Vileplume (excluding effects of attacks or Poké-Powers), you may use this power. If you attach a Grass Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. If you attach a Psychic Energy card, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Disturbing Pollen
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Guard Claw
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Anorith by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.effect: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Camerupt does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Castform on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Weather Ball
attacks.effect: If you have a Stadium card in play, remove 3 damage counters from Castform. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Rain Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Rain Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform Rain Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Snow-cloud Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Snow-cloud Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform Snow-cloud Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Sunny Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Sunny Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform Sunny Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Castform Sunny Form.

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifblim by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Strategy
attacks.effect: Each player counts the number of cards in his or her opponent's hand. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a number of cards equal to the number of cards his or her opponent had.

attacks.name: Super Eggsplosion
attacks.effect: Discard as many Energy cards as you like attached to your Pokémon. For each Energy card you discarded, flip a coin. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sharp Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Magical Step
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused. Put 6 damage counters instead of 3 on the Confused Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grind
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Grumpig.

abilities.name: Revenge Fang
abilities.effect: If you have less Benched Pokémon than your opponent, each of Houndoom's attacks does 40 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Burning Sensation
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Houndoom.

attacks.name: Strong Current
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Energy Split
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Energy cards attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Bolt
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Lanturn.

attacks.name: Comet Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Baton Pass
attacks.effect: You may switch Ledian with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to Ledian as you like to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Focus Blast
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spike Lariat
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunderous Claw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Lightning Energy attached to Luxio.

attacks.name: Heavy Bone
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Marowak can't use Heavy Bone during your next turn.

attacks.name: Bone Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Metang during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Bite On
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon isn't an Evolved Pokémon, that Pokémon can't attack, retreat, or use any Poké-Powers during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Harass
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon you have in play.

abilities.name: Cast-off Shell
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Ninjask from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon and if your Bench isn't full, you may put Shedinja onto your Bench as a Basic Pokémon from your hand or your discard pile.

attacks.name: Chip Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fasten Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Charge Dash
attacks.effect: You may do 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Piloswine does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Aqua Pump
attacks.effect: You may discard up to 2 Water Energy cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Star Boomerang
attacks.effect: You may return Starmie and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Core Flash
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Swallow Up
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokémon and Swalot. If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Swalot's, this attack does 80 damage instead.

attacks.name: Gunk Shot
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Big Wing
abilities.effect: If Swellow has no Energy attached to it, Swellow's Retreat Cost is 0.

attacks.name: Mach Descent
attacks.effect: If Swellow was on your Bench this turn, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Herd Charge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Tauros you have in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, Tauros does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Tentacle Strike
attacks.effect: Search your opponent's discard pile for up to 2 Energy cards and attach them to any of your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. For each Energy card attached in this way, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dangerous Poison
attacks.effect: If Tentacruel has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

abilities.name: JUNK
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Unown J from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: RETIRE
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if Unown R is on your Bench, you may discard Unown R and all cards attached to it. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.) Then, draw a card.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Move any number of basic Energy cards attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

abilities.name: UNSEEN
abilities.effect: As long as Unown U is on your Bench, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done by your opponent's Pokémon to any Unown on your Bench.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Search your deck for any 1 card and discard it. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: VACATION
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 2 damage counters from each of your Pokémon. If you do, your turn ends. This power can't be used if Unown V is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: WALL
abilities.effect: As long as Unown W is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

abilities.name: YAWN
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown Y is on your Bench, you may remove 1 damage counter from 1 of your Active Unown and that Unown is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Trainer cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown ? is on your Bench, you may choose a Pokémon in your hand and put it face down. Your opponent guesses a type of that Pokémon. Reveal that card. If your opponent guessed wrong, draw a card. Then, put that card back into your hand.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw a card.

abilities.name: Metal Chain
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to Beldum (excluding effects of attacks or Poké-Powers), you may search your deck for Beldum and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Beldum does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Allure
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Vine Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Careless Tackle
attacks.effect: Bellsprout does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Rest
attacks.effect: Remove all Special Conditions and 4 damage counters from Buneary. Buneary is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Aqua Spark
attacks.effect: If Chinchou has any Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Bonemerang
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Grass Basic Pokémon and Psychic Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Light Poison
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Frustration
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that doesn't have any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Space Out
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Gloom. Gloom is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Stinky Nectar
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Gastro Acid
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Counter Punch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if Hitmonchan is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Hitmonchan is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gut Strike
attacks.effect: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmonchan, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Gut Kick
attacks.effect: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmonlee, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokémon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Triple Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Gut Spin
attacks.effect: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmontop, you may switch Hitmontop with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.effect: Switch Horsea with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.effect: Ledyba does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Lileep.

attacks.name: Pay Day
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Show Off
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Payback
attacks.effect: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Nose Poke
attacks.effect: If Probopass is on your Bench, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Oddish.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Pineco does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Twiddle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Recharge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Shinx. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Rob
attacks.effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent has any Pokémon Tool or Technical Machine cards in his or her hand, put those cards on top of his or her deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bounce
attacks.effect: You may switch Spoink with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to Staryu and remove 3 damage counters from Staryu.

attacks.name: Sniff Out
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Taillow's Peck attack's base damage is 30.

attacks.name: Crystal Barrier
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tentacool during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Mysterious Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Hitmonlee, Hitmonchan, or Hitmontop from your hand onto Tyrogue (this counts as evolving Tyrogue) and remove all damage counters from Tyrogue.

attacks.name: Gut Blow
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and Tyrogue does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: U-turn
attacks.effect: Switch Yanma with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Yanma during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Psychic Aura
abilities.effect: Each of your Psychic Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Deep Balance
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

abilities.name: Shoot Poison
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Gliscor LV.X from your hand onto your Active Gliscor, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Night Slash
attacks.effect: You may switch Gliscor with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Electric Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Lightning or Metal Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Magnezone is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Cyber Shock
attacks.effect: Discard a Lightning Energy and a Metal Energy attached to Magnezone. The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Healing Look
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: If you don't have Uxie LV.X and Azelf LV.X in play, this attack does nothing. Discard all Energy attached to Mesprit.

abilities.name: Psybarrier
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo by your opponent's Pokémon that isn't an Evolved Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Burn
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Mewtwo.

attacks.name: Hard Crush
attacks.effect: Discard the top 5 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage for each Energy card you discarded.

attacks.name: Upthrow
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for all Fighting Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.

abilities.name: Trade Off
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can't be used if Uxie is affected by a Special Condition. You can't use more than 1 Trade Off Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Zen Blade
attacks.effect: Uxie can't use Zen Blade during your next turn.
